li.label: warcasket
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is entombed in a warcasket. No amount of pain will have an effect on them, and they can never go into a pain shock or drop unconscious due to pain. Because of how bulky the armor is and how much energy it takes to use it, {PAWN_nameDef} is not capable of doing any work.

li.label: shellcasket
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} was entombed in a warcasket, and then brutally pulled out of one. The neural and nerve damage from being unplugged is so severe that {PAWN_nameDef} is in constant, agonizing pain and can barely assemble his thoughts. Only installing {PAWN_nameDef} back in a warcasket can cure the symptoms.
